strings: <se_def><Cap><leader> reads Jessica's letter.
<voice_0x010009F4><se_high>‘I don't know who will find this letter.
<voice_0x010009F5><se_high>‘But please consider it my last will and testament. For by the time you read this, I will already be gone.
<voice_0x010009F6><se_high>‘I am going to the tower in the east. I will not return until my brother's death is avenged.
<voice_0x010009F7><se_high>‘Mother, I'm sorry for the damage I've caused to our family's reputation. But this is about some[-]thing far bigger than tradition.
<voice_0x010009F8><se_high>‘I must follow my heart, no matter the consequences. Please forgive me.

<voice_0x010009F9><se_high>‘And to Bangerz and Mash, I'm sorry for lying
to you. I hope you'll forgive me as well.
Signed,
Jessica’

<voice_0x010009FA><se_high>Bangerz: What!? A letter from Jessica?
No way! You're lying!

<voice_0x010009FB><se_high>Bangerz: She's been in her room the whole time!
So how could she give you a letter?
<voice_0x010009FC><se_high>Mash: I dunno. It sounds sorta real to me.
<voice_0x010009FD>Bangerz: ......

<voice_0x010009FE><se_high>Bangerz: Okay! Fine!
I'll check her room!
<voice_0x010009FF><se_high>Bangerz: But if I'm right, you'd better leave and never come back! Got it?

<voice_0x01000A00><se_high>Bangerz: Right. Just wait here.
No running away, now!

<voice_0x01000A01><se_high>Bangerz: Well, tough luck!
I'm checkin' anyway.
Don't you move!
<voice_0x01000A02><se_high>Bangerz: Hey! She is gone!
<voice_0x01000A03><se_high>Bangerz: Gimme that letter!
<Cap><leader> gives Jessica's letter to Bangerz.
<voice_0x01000A04><se_high>Bangerz: This is definitely Jessica's handwriting.

<voice_0x01000A05><se_high>Bangerz: But if she really did go to the tower,
she'll end up just like her brother Alistair!

<voice_0x01000A06><se_high>Bangerz: This is bad...
This is REALLY bad...

<voice_0x01000A07><se_high>Bangerz: We've gotta do something!
We've gotta get her out of there!
<voice_0x01000A08><se_high>Bangerz: You! This is partly your fault!

<voice_0x01000A09><se_high>Bangerz: So I'll open the door to the tower.
You go in and get her. Got it?

<voice_0x01000A0A><se_high>Bangerz: What!? Come on!
You have to help!

<voice_0x01000A0B><se_high>Bangerz: Okay! We've gotta hurry! To get to the tower,
go left down the path outside the village!
Bangerz joins your party!

<voice_0x01000A0C><se_high>Bangerz: One more thing.
I'll leave the monsters to you lot!
<voice_0x01000A0D><se_high>Bangerz: Listen, Mash. Whatever you do, don't let Jessica's mum find out where she went!
<voice_0x01000A0E><se_high>Mash: Yessir, Bangerz!

<voice_0x01000A0F><se_high>Bangerz: Good! Come on!
We've gotta hurry!
